// src/components/HowToPlay.js import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import './HowToPlay.css'; // Import sample images (replace with your actual screenshots) import signupImg from '../assets/signup-screenshot.png'; import loginImg from '../assets/login-screenshot.png'; import createGameImg from '../assets/create-game-screenshot.png'; import joinGameImg from '../assets/join-game-screenshot.png'; import gameplayImg from '../assets/gameplay-screenshot.png'; import leaderboardImg from '../assets/leaderboard-screenshot.png'; import secretSetupImg from '../assets/secretSetupImg.png'; const HowToPlay = () => { return (
{/* Navigation Bar */}

NUMBERPOSITION

Home How to Play Leaderboard About

How to Play NUMBER POSITION

01

Getting Started

Sign Up

Create your account using the signup form. You'll need:

  • Unique username
  • Valid email address
  • Secure password

Log In

Access your account using your credentials:

  • Registered email
  • Account password

02

Game Setup

Create a Game

Start a new game session:

  1. Click "Create New Game"
  2. Wait for game ID generation
  3. Share ID with your opponent

Join a Game

Enter an existing game:

  1. Click "Join Existing Game"
  2. Enter valid game ID
  3. Wait for host approval

03

Secret Number Setup

🔒

Creation Rules

  • Must be 4 digits (0-9)
  • All digits must be unique
  • Cannot start with zero
💡

Valid Examples

1234 7853 9012

Invalid Examples

1123 0456 9999
⚠️

Your secret number is hidden until the game ends. Both players must set their numbers before gameplay begins.

{/* Step 04: Gameplay */}

04

Gameplay Mechanics

Turn Structure

1

Enter 4-digit guess in your turn

2

Receive instant feedback: C = Correct Digits P = Correct Positions

3

Opponent gets their turn

Example Round

3 5 2 9
C:2 P:1

Interpretation: 2 correct digits, 1 in right position

🎯

Pro Tip: Use process of elimination based on feedback to narrow down possible combinations.

05

Leaderboards

Track your progress and compete with others:

  • Wins/Losses/Draws statistics
  • Global ranking system
  • Special achievements

Ready to Play?

Start Playing Now

© {new Date().getFullYear()} Number Position Game. All rights reserved.

Privacy Policy Terms of Service
); }; export default HowToPlay;
